parameters:
General Store: Hmm... I'm in trouble... The
organization isn't progressing at all... Maybe I
should ask a supplier for help...
Do you want me to talk to them?

General Store: Oh my... W-Welcome... I mean...
H-Hello, do you need something?

Well, I was just wondering what kind of store this
is... and when I casually walked in, it seemed
like you were troubled, so...

If it's okay with you, could you tell me what's
troubling you?

General Store: Huh! Is it okay?! As you can tell,
I'm in trouble...

General Store: Actually, this shop... is a general
store.

General Store: It seems that the shop owner was
running the store alone, but they had a back
injury a while ago and had to quit.

General Store: So, the shop owner, who happens to
be a relative of my cousin's aunt's acquaintance
next door, offered to sell me this store at a
discounted price.

General Store: I'm a college student and I have
free time during this season, so I thought it
would be a good opportunity to gain some
experience, that's why I accepted the offer.

General Store: But when I came here, it's in this
state... I have no idea which items will sell and
which ones are garbage...

General Store: I guess I could try asking a
supplier for help... but I don't have much
money...
If that's the case, I'll help you.

General Store: Huh! Is that okay?! But... if I
accidentally throw away something expensive...

Don't worry. I'm actually quite knowledgeable
about antiques and rare trinkets. And... despite
appearances, I have plenty of physical strength
too♪

General Store: Really?!... In that case, I would
like to ask for your help... Um... How much would
it cost approximately...?

Money is fine. In exchange, I can only come during
my free time though.

General Store: I-Is that okay?! Th-Then, please,
I'm begging you!!

(Alright... I hope this increases their faith... I
have to work hard to be appreciated...!)

(But... this amount will definitely take time and
my clothes might get dirty... I should prepare a
change of clothes.)

General Store Owner: Oh, thank you Ayako-san. Are
you perhaps here to help?
I just stopped by for a moment
ちょっと寄っただけ・・・

General Store Owner: I see... Please come back
when you have time again.

General Store Owner: U-Um... um... when can you
come next...?
Well... I'm not quite sure yet...
General Store Owner: I see... I understand...

Ah... come to think of it, my schedule might be a
little earlier... If that's the case, I'll come
right away.

General Store Owner: I-Is that true!!! Tha...
\.cough... Thank you very much!

(Hehe... If you're this happy, I can do my best
too)

General Store Owner: Ah...! Heheh... Th-thank
you...

(Huh...? The atmosphere has changed...? How should
I put it... It feels like... you're expecting
something?)

(But, a promise is a promise, so I should help...
right?)

General Store Owner: Huh...!? Ah... I see...
Understood... Please ask again next time...

General Store: School uniforms...? Ah, now that
you mention it, they are in the back.

General Store: Selling those kinds of things and
being seen by school staff could lead to some
strange misunderstandings...

General Store: Eh, Ayako-san will take care of
disposing them? In that case, I'm sorry but please
go ahead.

General Store Owner: Ah...! Th-thank you very
much....
....? Your face is turning red, are you okay?

General Store Owner: I-I'm, I'm fine! Please take
care of me again next time!

General Store: Ayako-san! Can I ask for your
help?!

General Store: Ah... Ayako-san's... ♡ Such a cute
person with such a raw, fragrant liquid...

General Store: Shh...! W-When did you...!? I-It's
nothing, really~!!
General Store Can I...!! Ask for your help?!

General Store\} Ayako-san's voyeur video made
quite a profit... But in order to keep it from
getting boring, I need to capture footage in more
and more different places... Mumbling, mumbling...
(Seems like you're preoccupied with the store)

It's quite beautiful... but if we decide to sell
this, it might lead to some strange troubles...

Let me dispose of it myself. Let's ask the
shopkeeper.
